title: Find Files with glob
description: Create a Path for current directory and use glob('*.txt') to find all .txt files. Convert the result to a list and store in 'txt_files'.
setupCode:
from pathlib import Path
import os
os.makedirs('temp_test', exist_ok=True)
open('temp_test/a.txt', 'w').close()
open('temp_test/b.txt', 'w').close()
open('temp_test/c.py', 'w').close()
starterCode: # Use glob to find .txt files in temp_test
hints: Convert the generator to a list
